attributes.action: revisit the change of tenancy rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present it is only possible for one change of tenancy which means that if you live with your parents and one of them dies, that counts as one change of tenancy, when your other parent dies you are not allowed to take on the tenancy as it would be a 2nd change of tenancy, this is a stupid rule and the goverment should look at this again to prevent future additional distress that this rule causes individuals already suffering from loss
